thread.title: BRIEF-EMA Recommends Against Approval Of Puma Biotechnology's Breast Cancer Drug Neratinib‍​

title: BRIEF-EMA Recommends Against Approval Of Puma Biotechnology's Breast Cancer Drug Neratinib‍​

organizations.name: brief-ema recommends against approval of puma
brief-ema recommends against approval of puma biotechnology

text: February 23, 2018 / 12:15 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-EMA Recommends Against Approval Of Puma Biotechnology's Breast Cancer Drug Neratinib‍​ Reuters Staff Feb 23 (Reuters) - EU Medicines Agency: * EU MEDICINES AGENCY RECOMMENDATIONS FOR FEBRUARY 2018 * EU MEDICINES AGENCY RECOMMENDATIONS FOR FEBRUARY 2018 BREAST CANCER DRUG NERATINIB * EU MEDICINES AGENCY RECOMMENDS APPROVAL OF PFIZER'S MYLOTARG FOR TREATMENT OF ACUTE MYELOID LEUKAEMIA‍​‍​‍​ Source ( bit.ly/2FtAttD ) Further company coverage:
